user.title: PaddiSense Farm Management
user.description: Welcome to PaddiSense! This wizard will help you set up your farm registry.

detect_existing.title: Existing Data Detected
detect_existing.description:
Found existing registry data:
- {paddock_count} paddocks
- {bay_count} bays
- {season_count} seasons

Would you like to import this data?

import_confirm.title: Confirm Import
import_confirm.description:
This will import your existing registry data:
- {paddock_count} paddocks
- {bay_count} bays
- {season_count} seasons

Click Submit to continue.

paddock.title: Add First Paddock (Optional)
paddock.description: Optionally add your first paddock. You can skip this and add paddocks later.

error.paddock_error: Failed to create paddock. The name may already exist.

add_paddock.title: Add Paddock
add_paddock.description: Create a new paddock with bays.

delete_paddock.title: Delete Paddock
delete_paddock.description: Select a paddock to delete. This will also delete all associated bays.

set_active_season.title: Set Active Season
set_active_season.description: Select the active season for your farm.

add_paddock.name: Add Paddock
add_paddock.description: Create a new paddock in the farm registry.

delete_paddock.name: Delete Paddock
delete_paddock.description: Delete a paddock and all its bays.

set_current_season.name: Set Paddock Current Season
set_current_season.description: Set whether a paddock is in the current season.

add_bay.name: Add Bay
add_bay.description: Add a bay to an existing paddock.

delete_bay.name: Delete Bay
delete_bay.description: Delete a bay from a paddock.

set_active_season.name: Set Active Season
set_active_season.description: Set the active season for the farm.

delete_farm.name: Delete Farm
delete_farm.description: Delete a farm (only if no paddocks assigned).

export_registry.name: Export Registry
export_registry.description: Export registry data to a backup file.

import_registry.name: Import Registry
import_registry.description: Import registry data from a backup file.
